title: Change Detection Method in Angular - AiA 359
description: In this episode, I discuss the ability to turn off change detection for certain components and still enjoy "automatic" change detection with JS Proxies and the new Angular "inject"  function, it's downsides and use cases

title: The Problems with the Angular Test-Bed ft. Georgi Parlakov - AiA 334
description: With Georgi Parlakov as guest, we discussed situations when developers can bypass using the TestBed module for unit testing, and the approach he developed for unit testing in Angular.

title: TypeScript Mixins - AiA 327
description: This time we conducted a panel discussion and I presented the topic of Mixins - function that return classes to share functionality - and how they can be used in Angular development

title: All Things TypeScript ft. Wycliffe Maina - AiA 326
description: With Maina Wycliffe as guest, we discusses TypeScript advanced topics like utility types, type narrowing, how type inference works and more. I participated as host

title: RxJS Best Practices in Angular ft. Tomas Trajan - AiA 324
description: With Tomas Trajan as a guest we discussed best practices for using RxJS in Angular applications, and also some interesting tricks and approaches for NgRx/RxJS. I participated as a panelist

title: Power Up Angular with RXjs with Armen Vardanyan - AiA 308
description: This was my very first podcast episode ever. I was a guest on the Adventures in Angular podcast and we discussed RxJS and how to use it in Angular applications. It went well, so later Charles invitied me to be a panelist on the show.
